title: 106_s2243
content: Repeals deadline dates for the appointment of a Council chairperson, executive director, and members. Repeals a required Council study on the award of Federal prime contracts and subcontracts to women-owned businesses. Directs the Council to work with State and local officials and business leaders to develop the infrastructure for women's business enterprise so as to increase women's effectiveness in shaping the economic agendas of their States and communities. Extends through FY 2003 the authorization of appropriations for Council activities.
